mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USR_TABLE ( USR_NO, USR_ID, USR_PASSWORD, USR_NAME, USR_HOBBY, USR_AGE, USR_JOB ) VALUES ( (select *from (select max(seq)+1 from usr_table) next), #{usr_id}, #{usr_password}, #{usr_name}, #{usr_hobby}, #{usr_age}, #{usr_job} )
mapper.select: SELECT USR_SEQ_NO as usr_seq_no, USR_ID as usr_id, PASSWORD as password, USR_NAME as usr_name, USR_NICKNAME as usr_nickname, USR_BIRTHDATE as usr_birthdate FROM USER_INFO WHERE USR_ID=#{usr_id} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
